It’s known as “Don Colossus.” A group of cryptocurrency investors paid $300,000 to have a 15-foot-tall statue of President Trump sculpted in tribute to his outspoken support for crypto. They hope it will soon be installed at one of his Florida golf courses. Read m Facebook
